text.content:
Brained

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Bludgeoning

Kidney Piercing

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.

Piercing

Fingertipped

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and can't use one of its hands (chosen randomly by the GM).

Slashing

Eyeburn

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell
